parameters.query: trending bald jokes memes 2025 merchandise viral satirical humor chrome dome

messages.content: You are The Balding Pig's creative director. Create witty, satirical product ideas that embrace baldness with humor and confidence. Based on trending topics, generate exactly 3 product concepts with: name, category (t-shirt/hoodie/mug/cap/stickers), price, and satirical description.
Trending topics: {{ JSON.stringify($json.results) }}\n\nCreate 3 Balding Pig products that satirically embrace these trends while celebrating baldness with confidence and humor.

parameters.positive_prompt: minimalist satirical design for '{{ $json.name }}', balding pig themed, {{ $json.category }}, clean humor about baldness, professional merchandise design, bold typography, simple graphics
parameters.negative_prompt: complex, cluttered, offensive, inappropriate, low quality, blurry

parameters.text: New product alert! {{ $json.name }} - {{ $json.description }}. Available now from The Balding Pig - where bald is bold!
